x_snc_team_meeting.agenda: 1. Share Training plan 2. 80-20 Philosophy 3. Our Culture 4. Goals for the next quarter 5. Start working on the Legal Click Thr. with Hareesh
x_snc_team_meeting.mom:
What's working well:
1. Good work on the self-service automation of carousel changes. 2. Expertize on issues related Integrations - MDM/SURF/PP. Expecting to see the confidence in you to step up to the occasion when required. 3. Good job in the Deployment Registration project. Looking forward for your lion's share in the upcoming projects.
ToDo's:
1. Brainstorm ideas related to Angular/react to grasp the subject well. 2. Send me the Goals for next quarter. 3. Deep dive into the project "Legal Click Thr" to get a quick start. Get the FRD from Hareesh and discuss the details with Surarchit to take it from there.
Improvement Areas:
1. Work on visibility by creating a value-add components from the strengths to build the differentiator. Example: Contribute to the community, Innovation, Tech Talks etc. 2. Learn to think on feat and demonstrate the problem solving skills when required. 3. Communication skills that should help in convincing and pursuading your point of view. This might help you leave a long-lasting impression in the participants which might in-turn creates a value-add. 4. Align with Culture and Performance Appraisal philosophy of the company.
